Detailed Description

An implementation of the RTRManagedNumeric base class which provides modification operations and uses the class RTRMNumericImpl for storage allocation.

See Also:
RTRPublicObject, RTRPublicString, RTRPublicBoolean, RTRPublicCounter, RTRPublicGauge RTRPublicNumericRange, RTRPublicStringConfig, RTRPublicNumericConfig, RTRPublicGaugeConfig, RTRPublicBooleanConfig
